data.title: XGPaint: Fast extragalactic foreground mocks
data.name: XGPaint.jl
data.description: fast forward simulations of extragalactic foregrounds

evidence: Repository owner is the organization `WebSky-CITA`, suggesting a specific research project/group identity rather than a broad foundation or vendor.
"`XGPaint.jl` paints maps of extragalactic foregrounds using halo catalogs" â€“ domain-specific scientific functionality, indicating a research application rather than a generic library.
The README only links to documentation and CI badges, with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying users obtain and use it directly from the GitHub source repository.
